name: Step / Movement
description: Move your herder along the path. You must follow arrows.

name: Certificate
description: Increases the value of your wool during delivery. Can be temporary (0 cost) or permanent.

name: Gold
description: Used to buy cards/upgrades. Tracked on the player board.

name: Cycle / Draw-Discard
description: Draw X cards from your deck, then discard X cards from your hand.

name: Sheep Card
description: Primary resource. distinct types are needed for Wellington delivery. Breeding value determines income.

name: Shepherd
description: Used to buy sheep from the market. Reduces cost by Â£1 per Shepherd.

name: Craftsman
description: Used to construct private buildings. Cost is 2 Craftsmen per building level.

name: Sailor
description: Used to move your ship. 1 Sailor = 1 Movement point.

name: Shearer
description: Used during shearing (delivery). Increases wool value.

name: Hazard
description: Floods, Rockfalls, Droughts. You must pay the cost shown to cross. If you cannot pay, you cannot move through.

name: Flood
description: Green hazard. Pay the cost shown to cross; otherwise you cannot pass.

name: Rockfall
description: Grey hazard. Pay the cost shown to cross; otherwise you cannot pass.

name: Drought
description: Yellow hazard. Pay the cost shown to cross; otherwise you cannot pass.

name: Build Action
description: Place a private building on an empty space. Pay 2 Craftsmen per level.

name: Train Action
description: Hire a worker by paying its cost. Some spaces offer bonuses.

name: Objective Action
description: Take or complete an objective card according to the space.
